properties.address: Calverton Baptist Church, Nottingham, Nottinghamshire NG14 6JS
properties.description: We are a small village Church with regular events. The first Wednesday of every month we have a Soup and Surprise at 11am until 1.30pm. Every Friday we have a coffee morning 10.30-12.30pm. We also accept donations for the local foodbank.
properties.title: Calverton Baptist Church

properties.address: Charles Street Methodist Church, Newark, Nottinghamshire NG24 1RN
properties.description: The space is open to all. We are open from 8.30 -12.00 on a Tuesday morning and serve light refreshments. There is an area to accommodate small children . Sometimes there are organised activities such as crafts. In the afternoon, from 1.15- 2.45 there is a Parent and Carers Toddlers Group during term time. There is also access to Wi Fi. The Warm Welcome Space is open for most weeks of the year, although is closed for some weeks around Christmas, Easter and summer.
properties.title: Charles Street Methodist Church

properties.description: Open to all for hot drinks, cakes and a lunch
properties.title: Connections

properties.description: An open time offering homemade soup and sandwiches, hot drinks, board games and conversation
properties.title: Cotgrave Methodist Church warm welcome space

properties.address: Inspire Culture, Learning and Libraries, Newark, Nottinghamshire NG22 8JN
properties.title: Farnsfield Library

properties.address: Inspire Culture, Learning and Libraries, Newark, Nottinghamshire NG24 1UW
properties.description: Discover a welcoming place to read, learn, and enjoy culture at Inspire Libraries. Whether you want to browse and borrow books, use a PC, research family history, or simply relax in our refreshment areas, we have something for everyone. Join our regular events—perfect for meeting new people and trying activities like crafting, colouring, reading groups, and children’s sessions. Drop in to our Places of Welcome group to reconnect with your community. Looking to learn? Our Adult Learning courses offer a friendly environment to gain new skills or explore a hobby just for fun. Experience cultural events close to home, from jazz and author talks to family concerts, theatre, workshops, and more—all in a welcoming space right in your local community.
properties.title: Newark Library

properties.description: Open from 3/11/2022. Come along for a warm up and some rest and relaxation in our cosy church building and remember we don't bite! lol The only things to bite are some nice breakfast food and biscuits! Parents need to supervise their children. Some toys are available
properties.title: Thursday Warm Welcome Space

properties.address: Holy Trinity Church, Southwell, Nottinghamshire NG25 0LD
properties.description: This space is for children aged 0 to 5 and their carer. It runs from 8:45 to 11:00 during school term time.
